name: Piano Hall VR
description:
Piano Hall VR is made for VR, made using Steam VR and is best experienced with the Valve Index controllers.

Piano Hall VR is a small, seated experience where you start out on a stage in front  of a piano, and what you play is up to you.

Features:

  • Piano
  • Pressure sensitive piano keys
  • C sharp and D flat
  • Applause
